short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant influencer insights and analytics for Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok with IMAI's powerful browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Invaluable insights such as:

• Influencer ROI
• Influencer Content Tracking & Analysis
• Audience Demographics & Engagement


How it works:

1. Open a social media profile (YouTube, Instagram or TikTok) in your Chrome browser
2. Click the "IMAI Profile Insight" button to view detailed influencer performance metrics and statistics in one streamlined dashboard.

This tool empowers you to identify the ideal creators for your campaigns based on robust performance data.

Start now by installing the IMAI Chrome extension!
